entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Manicouagan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:39 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to flurries at times heavy near noon. Risk of snow squalls in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
